item.title: M
item.description: score:144 Chances: Macy’s kicks off the back-to-school season with a wide range of fashion and accessories. The consumer cyclical sector is gaining steam this year. Macy’s to report second quarter 2023 sales and earnings results on August 22, 2023. Retailers like Macy’s expanding use of ‘breathable’ and ‘cooling’ fabrics to boost sales during heat waves.
